'''1.14.30.2''' is a major update for the [[Bedrock Dedicated Server]]s, released on February 6, 2020, that updates the servers for [[Bedrock Edition 1.14.30]] and fixes bugs.

== Changes ==
; [[Bedrock Dedicated Server]]s
* Updated for 1.14.30 clients.

== Fixes ==
* Added {{cd|ops.json}} and {{cd|whitelist.json}} back to the default BDS packs. ({{bug|BDS-43}})
* Previously created worlds can now be loaded to a server once again. ({{bug|BDS-948}})
* Bees' AI now works on Bedrock Dedicated Servers. ({{bug|BDS-2170}})
